cause.description:
In response to Piano's announcement that he would no longer be working on the redevelopment of Boston's Financial District and that he was rescinding his offer to design Mayor Menino's dream skyscraper.
1. Fire Project's Chief Developer Steve Belkin
2. Hire New Developer who Will Work with Renzo Piano
3. Put Boston on the Map with a "green" skyscraper designed by a major modern architect
cause.mission: have Boston's Mayor Menino fire Steve Belkin and hire a developer who will actually work with Architect Renzo Piano
cause.name: Bring Piano Back to Boston
